bow: sahm style dressing habits keep finding myself in rut with my clothes because stay home only go out for errands or the gym and the occasional date wearing pjs all day is whatever but ends up making me feel depressed or not like an adult even when pressed to think of how want to dress or what clothes to get usually come up blank but lot of that is because ve got very small budget for personal spending did any of you go through this too and get over it what helped you get out of rut my go to outfits are dresses with leggings underneath had three babies pretty much back to back so ve been kind of stuck with tummy that self conscious about dresses let me still feel kind of cute while hiding that leggings mean don feel self conscious about crawling around on the floor with the kids there are lot of days might not get dressed until 10 but definitely feel way better eventually getting dressed than if stay in pjs all day sometimes if watching show or scrolling through pinterest and see an outfit like snap photo of it and then take it with me when go out shopping so can find nearly identical things it can be so so difficult to dress oneself when you feel like the human manifestation of laundry will also swipe some insane lipstick on regardless of what wearing and feel lot better absolutely do think ve ever really gotten out of the rut either because went from sahm to work from home mom so now have bit more money so do feel guilty about spending money on myself but still do feel like shelling out for cute clothes is good return on investment then again not that girly only wear make up on date night and choose to wear jeans and black tank top times out of 10 but if dressing better or taking time to get dolled up improves your mental health it totally worth it the advice ve read is to find uniform that you like whether it plain like mine jeans and tank top with cardigan for cooler months or maxi dress and ballet flats find style that you like that is versatile good for errands or playdates or teacher conferences and buy few of those for instance buy or maxi dresses and two pairs of ballet flats that work with them and your purse that way you can mix and match but always have something you want to wear if you find dress or pants you like and that are flattering buy them in few different colors another recommendation is to go through your closet and give away stuff you never wear if you re looking at full dresser but wear none of those clothes that depressing and is not going to motivate you to get new stuff anything that does fit or is really beat up or you just do like donate it to charity or clothing recycler then when your closet is half empty you ll realize it time to go shopping leave your kids with your partner or parent and take day to get new clothes alternatively order bunch of things from nordstrom rack keep what fits and then return what does good luck mama really enjoy the stay at home mom portion from get your pretty on got it free two year ago and signed up again this year and you don have to buy new clothes to make it work it work checking out legit live in moo moos athletic wear that never working out in pjs bathrobes yogas only put real clothes on if anticipate going out people coming honestly think it almost normal as sahm to do this don feel bad about comfort realistically what sahm is in full nice outfit not this momma sahm here to 14mo and pregnant again so super unmotivated to dress cute now that it summer it easier for me to throw dress on and feel cute winter resort to yoga pants and hoodies but eh kind of okay with that wear lot of leggings and shirts take 15 minutes to put on makeup some days which makes me feel like whole new person so that where get my feel good from going to be going back to work soon and need to put on real clothes not looking forward to it work from home kinda the same live in comfy clothes and then have suits for when travel for work do stitch fix to help me add some nicer casual clothes ve also made myself stop leaving the house in comfy or workout clothes unless was really working out but have home gym so that never really the case anymore +1 on the uniform idea telecommute have uniform not kidding it keeps me from having to think about what am wearing each day and also from looking like hot mess in the winter wear jeans white layering shirt and lands end cashmere crew neck seater every day have like of them in different colors wait for them to go on 40 off and just keep adding colors it super comfortable but also can be easily dressed up with shoes and necklace on the summer have an army of maxi dresses this post totally also tooty poshmark to sell and buy items lularoe carly is my favorite and easiest dress from summer to fall and spring with leggings if you dont have big budget try amp or ross also you can stay in pjs or comfy clothes if it better but maybe try light makeup will stay home all day and wear pjs but will do oil of olay cc cream and mascara and feel better about myself am not sahm but felt like this on maternity leave find that if take shower every day and put on socks amp shoes feel worlds better dress like bum at home but shower and change into something cute before my husband comes home he wouldn mind at all if dressed like bum in front of him but it makes me feel good to look like normal human adult woman around him for style rut have you tried stitch fix love doing it every once in while because get sent stuff wouldn normally pick for myself they also include style inspiration cards with two outfit ideas for every item they send you like to copy the outfit ideas to feel trendy and fresh my uniform is leggings and swing dress from old navy comfortable flattering for me and can get down on the floor walk bike lounge and snuggle whatever need to do the swing dresses go on sale regularly for 15 20 cdn at old navy come in new patterns and colours each season and leggings are easy have four pairs of good ones stocked up on when they were on sale and do laundry for myself twice week basically copied my daughters favourite outfits and have no regrets wear thick non see through leggings with long shirts ankle booties slap some jewelry on and magically do look like hot mess or wear maxi dresses knee length dresses with cute pair of flats or something make it look like gave crap about how rolled out the house do wear any makeup but always make sure my eyebrows are threaded and my hair is usually braided so it out of the way after couple of months of this same feeling tried harder to dress in at least jeans and tee every day also trained my babies to chill in their cribs in the morning with toy while brushed my teeth washed my face and at least put on some bb cream it made huge difference in how felt about myself the only frustrating annoying thing is still don have ton of clothes that fit me and one of my twins and sometimes the other too will puke on me and then don have out of the house clothes lol so still wear sweats some days but try hard to not live in pjs even just changing into sweats makes me feel better and when go out still wear makeup and dress myself up little bit even if it just to the grocery store just looked and didn see the sahm portion do you have direct link my daughter was born in march and already feel this way yes an art teacher and mom so the dresses with leggings let me be comfy but still kind of look put together can go flawlessly from scraping paint out of paintbrushes to digging hot wheels out from under the couch stay at home mom here too wear lots of comfy jeans and jean shorts plain shirts and cute kimono type open flowy shirts in the winter since live in fl summer is patterned tank tops and sun dresses with like bike shorts underneath have to get dressed every day or else start feeling really depressed my go to lately has been shorts and plain neck shirt have about 10 different colored ones from old navy and bunch of cute shorts started branching out to some more cutsie things like ribbed shirts and ribbed tanks peasant shirts do the french tuck in my shirts to make myself look little more put together and maybe sometimes ll throw in belt it pretty basic look but it makes me feel so much better say the staple of my wardrobe are the shorts jeans wear mostly jean shorts live in the desert where shorts are year round item but have lot of softer cloth shorts with patterns on them or linen material try to avoid leggings and oversized shirts basically dress like this 99 of the time substitute the shorts for pair of jeans when it cold https images app goo gl x9dx1nfejjnknznt8 have to get dressed every day or else start feeling really depressed my go to lately has been shorts and plain neck shirt have shirts to make myself look little more put together and maybe sometimes ll throw in belt it pretty basic look but it makes me feel so much better say the staple of my wardrobe are the shorts jeans really sure why this is downvoted do you guys not like poshmark or is it because lularoe is pyramid scheme hate mlms but ve found couple of the carly dresses at goodwill gosh darn those things are comfy and adorable to be from such horrible company love doing dark colored leggings with casual top and trendy sneakers for going to the store and that getup is also great for hanging at home while still being comfy that and having house clothes that are quite pajamas but do feel like complete bum if decide do want to put actual clothes on if need to put real clothes on do some skinny high waisted jeans since can dress them up or down if need be with top shoes that fit the occasion wow thanks for all the feedback since already on the leggings train are there any brands all like most got pair of workout leggings from tj maxx by brand called kyodan but they only had black seriously who ever decided that women should wear tight tops and pants dresses have been more flattering since like forever all the jiggly bellies muffin tops butt crack when bending over it goes away under dress it ebbs and flows with me right now we are in summer mode and spend pot of time in leggings bathing suit jean shorts tank tops etc during the school year have mom uniform in cases where helping in the class or need to be up there for whatever its usually khaki shorts from old navy with short sleeve top or with button down top and tennis shoes also like wearing running shorts even though mever run in them the thighs rub together so bad but pairing those with tank top is nice switch from leggings online shopping is game changer for me fought it for long time but it truly has helped even if end up having to return some pieces are you me wear lot of maxi dresses and skirts my entire wardrobe has come from the thrift store 90 degree reflex or is it 30 degree is often sold at tj maxx and on amazon and they re great quality used to wear lot cooler stuff we used to go out lot and had lot of cute dresses and hot jeans with sexy tops was also thinner work party time so have several work outfits but literally just before got pregnant the second time around more weeks tried stitch fix their prices were astronomical think what might help you is capsule wardrobe like 10 clothing items that you love that make you look good and got your personality mom capsule for me is pick jeans maybe some jogger pants or some other kind of upgraded comfort pant couple of simple shirts love me some black shirts tank tops couple more dressed up shirts think the word is blouses and some shirts and dresses one or two cardigans or jackets is make sure it all ready to wash and interchangeable shirts go with pants jeans and skirts etc then just wear that around the house that what do just because home does mean relaxing at home my kids should see me dress and treat myself with the same level of respect effort put into myself that do on the day work if you re thinking about updating your wardrobe but want to keep the budget down recommend trying things like poshmark and mercari have had bad purchase yet and some of my favorite pieces are from the like original quality lands end cardigans frye boots etc https getyourprettyon com sahm casual wardrobe capsule builder you have to enter your email after you follow the link for the free wardrobe list and her mailing list is one actually enjoy receiving emails from they re pretty basic but for me the fashion challenged they re super helpful always wear dresses they are comfortable easy to style am not casual dresser but am sure you could totally find some more casual ones if that is what you prefer also would assume that if you are working with smaller budget you could still find plenty of dresses in your price range that are easy to style like leggings and fit and flare dress as my go to looks like you put in effort but it lot easier and more comfortable than pants in my opinion when you shop for outfits plan on buying versatile items you can wear with different things maybe tank top to wear by itself and then layer it with cardigan etc so you can make more outfits out of less clothing usually go for nicer quality items that will last longer with many different looks haha definitely not having number so don think you but so glad to have found my people thredup for non athleisure wear if wake up in bad mood plan long walk with the dog and baby at nearby park or go early and dressed up to coffee shop to read or play with kiddo if he is awake he is my first and is months old ve been struggling with bit of cabin fever depression since about may do you have any tips on finding the best stuff at thrift shops only have month old but will say for the longest time would just stay in my pajamas and not bother with anything and oh what toll that took on my mental health switched my showers to night time and force myself to wash my face daily and always change my clothes even if go from one legging amp shirt combo to the next must change and that does wonders live in leggings and shirts but now that it summer it ll be running shorts amp tank tops like to buy plain color shirts mostly and bralettes ll buy my shirts little bigger longer so can add cute knot in it hm good question my husband and both really enjoy thrifting as hobby so guess the biggest thing for us is shopping fairly often about once week or so we like to try to go earlier in the week because at least at the goodwills in our area sunday is when they change the colored price tag that will be marked half off all week going early seems to help us find the most items with the week tag and mainly looking at stuff with that color helps us focus on the best deals tend to have the best luck at goodwill for clothes vs other thrift stores in our area because goodwill gets lot of brand new stuff know for sure they get stuff from target that doesn sell and ve seen lot of brands recognize from other stores that leads me to believe those other stores must send stock to goodwill too also some stores seem to have better selection on certain things for example our st vinnies has the best selection of furniture and huge toy section but clothes can be very hit or miss another local store does everything half off sales every few weeks and since their prices can be all over the place we wait for those sales to go there for the better deals figuring out stuff like that is helpful to avoid wasting time guess the biggest thing for me though is that just find it fun like treasure hunt don worry if don find anything on trip because next time there will be ton of new stuff also like following thriftstorehauls to get inspired by other redditors finds sure lot of them have better tips than do there are some crazy good thrifters on that sub me too sometimes ca find my new jeans just got to fit my new size and have to wear my maternity jeans and ugh mean that when even have the thought to wear real pants this thread has lots of good suggestions though just hate wearing dresses maybe it would be ok with leggings though ve never tried that my yoga teacher cleared out her closet and got pair of 90 degree pants they rule have priced them but have worn them weekly for years pro tip make friends with yoga teacher lol hang in there mama one thing have friend who works with wildlife tagging wolves and stuff she dresses for the job casual yet easy to move ties her hair back you know logical stuff have another girlfriend who works construction same thing goes her hair back sensible steel toe boots and thicker jeans our job is the same it physical and demanding and requires lot of movement no matter how do my hair in the morning look like ve been wrestling lion at the end of the day and that because we do our jobs well it just good thing to remind yourself of that you work physically demanding job it helps take the edge off on the days you just can even oh and eyebrows do your eyebrows the world is so much easier to deal with when you have eyebrows my uniform is the same and old navy is having dress sale right now ann taylor loft has more grown up lady styles and they re always having sales go straight to the sale section online and sort by price make point of taking shower and getting every morning create window for this after lo 3months first nap he happy playing in his crib for 10 15 minutes and it good for me to get that hurdle out of the way you re right that it is bit depressing to stay in pyjamas all day haven even dared to put on my pre pregnancy jeans it seems like almost every item had totally disintegrated during my pregnancy everything ended up with holes and rips or bleach stains went through everything tossed the crap and don have much leftover so post pregnancy ve pretty much been rotating couple pair of workout leggings four pairs of black old navy leggings and five target shirt even the underwire on my push up bras snapped at the same time and didn replace them ve been wearing sports bras for months need to work on replacing everything for the times when want to go out and look decent but when you re rocking greasy hair and you ve probably just been puked on and you can barely schedule yourself shower getting new wardrobe becomes low priority you sound just like me think switch between the same outfits everyday in the same boat as you wanting to dress up or at least polished up more so ll feel better about myself then giving up and just wearing my pj or shorts and shirt tank top everyday struggled with this and found what works for me lularoe leggings and tunics or lularoe carly dresses it covers all is trendy and feels like jammies keep one pair of jeans and one pair of slacks plus sunday dresses reject the idea that need to feel beautiful to be happy bathe take care of my hygeine the rest is simply not hobby of mine right now my lo is 18months next week and still live in my cottony stretchy maternity leggings and cute shirts do work at the moment but even then just swap the tshirts for flowy tunics and the sneakers for flats had the opposite experience of feeling more like an adult while spending all day in pjs xd but thrifting helped me great deal you can look at things on pinterest or browse clothes online and collect looks it ideas that interest you and keep an eye out for things like them at thrift stores ve more than once found expensive things like doc martens nice leather jackets etc for under ten dollars in good condition ve been wearing leggings since the 80s and refuse to give it up during the 90s wore ripped baggy jeans and boxers with leggings under it all 2000s learned to wear skirts tunics and dresses again but still wear leggings under almost every outfit biker shorts under shorter skirts except pencil skirts although like longer leggings so don need to shave was huge tomboy but leggings gave me the freedom to be me while still dressing feminine you have got to try it it took me honestly couple years to learn how to dress my postpartum bod and lots of trial and error especially in the summer bc you can go wrong with leggings sweaters and boots in the winter downloaded the liketoknow app because if you find the right bloggers they will post sales and also like that they put outfit ideas together for you which helps me ton hope this helps also wear bike shorts under dresses so do flash anyone more comfortable if it too hot for leggings just started wearing dresses and get so many compliments but it even easier than finding pants and shirt do feel frumpy in different situation but stuck in rut with my work clothes my son is turning two and can probably count on one hand the number of clothes ve bought myself since he been around really need to update my wardrobe but ca justify the expense and feel guilty and self conscious sahm and make point to get dressed each day hate the feeling of keeping on my pjs now that it summer just stick to sundresses they are so versatile to any body shape long short form fitted flowy seriously there is sundress to flatter anybody sahm let me start with this get your nails done it amazing how put together you can feel with some color on your fingers get two or three pairs of jeans not leggings— jeans you will instantly feel dressed up right now am loving the boyfriend jean trend wear high waisted loose fit boyfriend jeans with cut ankles in the winter with ankle boots and in the summer with sandals chunky sandals are in living in birkenstocks have both regular pair and waterproof pair am currently rotating tuck shirts in have basic color blouson style shirts tuck into my pants look for nicer fabrics than just knits and cottons you will feel more dressy and less frumpy love georgette for blouson style look lace is also nice option flutter sleeves and boho vibes are in as well as anything 90s inspired ride the trend of comfy jeans because they look cool on anyone stick with basics that can be mixed and matched you want to look put together without the effort of planning ahead if you haven done laundry all week it nice to have an outfit that always works no matter what clean get new bra if you are small busted stick to modern bralette styles if you are larger busted look into the new styles with soft laces sculpted and push up bras are out bras are totally meant to be seen these days so get two or three in black and basic colors to wear under everything build up your collection over time stating with one is just fine do you like accessories if so wear one with any outfit never more be understated and savvy if you like necklace small geometric pendants are in style try gold or rose gold silver is okay but not as trendy atm earrings should be practical and suit your tastes but small is always in style but if you prefer statement go for larger hoops in gold makeup should be fresh and minimal when worn am currently sticking to cc cream mixed with spf lotion take care of not only your baby sling but yours too have very simple routine but sunscreen is always always part of it skip the eyeliner and focus on brightening up your face with soft blush accented with sheer highlighter on the cheek bone blend blend blend look natural and put together all at the same time you don need to spend tons of money the rack has awesome options and so does asos stay away from cheaper fast fashion companies like forever 21 as these are not made for multiple wearings and won suit the needs of mom in addition their cheap fabric is clingy and unflattering their patterns are cut more for teenagers and simply don work as well on adults remember one 60 piece that will last years is better investment than 10 shirts that you don really like or wear any way do beauty treatment to make your life better and easier just got my brows dyed and slightly shaped to my natural shape and feel instantly put together in the mornings last but not least sunglasses always makes everything look fancier nordstrom has some amazing 16 options in the bp area that are perfect for moms because if your kids ruins them or they get lost you won care smaller lenses rather than large men inspired styles are hot right now just few tips— go on and get your groove back we can be moms and be fashionable high waisted leggings try the zella high waisted live in legging in black from nordstrom cute bra with fun straps loose fitting tank in darker color done looking like fab momma nice leggings make huge difference and you will love love love the tummy control they do go on sale occasionally and when they do always buy one or two pairs live in dresses mostly because don need to coordinate an outfit was total athleisure champion before realized it didn feel good to wear leggings every day understand how to dress for your body type like which silhouettes work and which don am an inverted triangle and wish knew that terminology long time ago it helps to know what is generally unflattering for my body type as shop to immediately eliminate certain items zara changes out their styles so frequently it good place to look online at how they are pairing things there are so many styles and looks that if you go to poshmark or other consignment stores you can easily recreate looks and color trends may ask where you get your sundresses from think the only woman in the world who hates leggings lol they usually do have pockets seriously need pockets and find they just exaggerate the rolls and muffin top and the elasticated top just digs in uncomfortably love me good pair of jeans or harem type trousers with wide stretchy waistband and loose fitting long shirt also hate staying in pyjamas all day feel crappy and slobby even if wo be leaving the house all day want to be washed and dressed by 10 latest or just get in naggy rut for the day just want to say if you have trouble getting to store in person had really good experience with thred up it an online thrift store little more expensive than regular thrift store more like consignment shop but still better than buying new because you can get nicer brands for less money love thrifting it just harder with toddler also really looked into capsule wardrobes and spent ton of time thinking about what colors like and what outfits make me feel like look good what fabrics and style my style has totally gone out the window but don care about that most days do love my clothes though and love op shopping thrifting ive found some amazing quality items would never buy brand new but still in great condition and when you finish with something take it back to the op shop and the great cycle continues found this amazing turban style hat thing all glittery green and just had to buy it going to wear it when doing chores just to make me happy sometimes ll pick one item in my wardrobe haven worn in while and make it my mission to wear it that day american eagle has leggings with pockets and nice wide waistband they ve been life saver for me wide waistbands inches were game changer for me with leggings found decent casual skirt with pockets on amazon prefer skirts to shorts in summer and it goes with shirts pretty well it probably not super stylish but feels little more together than pajamas plus pockets womens regular and plus size https www amazon com dp b07pw9yt8w ref=ppx pop mob ap share the only downside is if crouch down to tie shoe or something it ready to step on the hem of the skirt which makes standing back up awkward lol jeans old navy sleeveless top and cardigan amazon basics it still not me in fact am was so excited to pull out all my maternity clothes because they feel so much more me than my nursing sahm wear super basic pocket tee shirt and shorts or leggings kind of gal it comfy enough to be pajamas without being pajamas wear leggings flat vans sandles or booties long line vest top as base layer and loose flowy top tunic or dress over it this is my uniform wear necklace and dress it up with make up if im going somewhere have gorgeous couple of chiffon tunics that look dressed up and wear those with heeled boots going out still leggings though leggings are life also long line vest dresses have like 10 of them and keep replacing them wear the same brand as base all day every day from amp am not sahm but struggle with this on the weekends even my best success has been assigning certain clothing as pajamas and never wearing them for anything but actual bedtime sleeping in the winter have two pears of jogger sweatpants that rotate and few long sleeve tees that are super comfy for the summer just bought two shorts tanktops sets from target to rotate always change clothes in the morning even if it just putting on something would be comfortable enough wearing to bed it usually leggings and tee or tank long sleeve tee and sweaters in the fall winter also bra definitely makes me feel dressed for the day stud earrings also make me feel put together without totally getting in the way of parenting sometimes do them sometimes not like to paint my nails on sunday night as well again it small thing that helps me feel put together and only requires effort on sunday night not daily because at the gym times week or walking always in athletic gear not the fanciest but it gets the job done plus side always feel confident running after my kids and playing with them because know my clothes will hold up wear sweats around the house but every time leave make sure get dressed once was at stable weight bought new pairs of jeans brands that were nice and knew would last and variety of gap shirts which are my all time fav throw on pair of jeans and tshirt and head out the door takes about 60 seconds but atleast feel presentable really like the amazon daily ritual jeggings size up they feel like tight leggings but you look like you re wearing real pants edit and they run 20 to 30 habit clothes are worth the money throw out or donate what you do like and it ll force you to go shopping for yourself get up early before the kids and get dressed going out in the morning makes the afternoon nap time so much easier anyway style look best in shorts and long sleeve shirts summer clothes are harder to look good in and stay comfortable but also it summer and everyone looks like they ve been drug through dessert so you do you second this love those leggings how the hell do you crawl around after baby with dress on guess they all wear leggings
